title: Oh ragunandhanA
sahitya:
O raghunandanA rAghava shrI raghunandanA rArA Ashrta jana samudaya mandAra



caraNam 1



 yAdi yuncumi nAmIda nIkE daya rAvalE gAdA nI 

pAdamulaku mrokkeda nAku pratyakSamu kArAdA



caraNam 2



 nI kAruNyamutOnu nEnu nirvahimpa dalacedanu 

nIkE marulukonnAnu niddampu mOmu jUcedanu



caraNam 3



 sarasija bhavanuta shauri nI sari daivamu likayEri 

sharaNaNTini ninu kOri sharajAla sharAsanadhAri



caraNam 4



 satatamu nA madilOnu ninu samsmarimpa dalacedanu 

gati nIvani namminAnu E gati brOcina nIvEnu



caraNam 5



 vara bhadrAcalavAsa bhAvaja shatakOTi vilAsa 

paramAnanda vikAsa paripAlita shrI rAmadAsa
